other_title: デュエル・マスターズ (Japanese)
plot: The balance of the Creature World is starting to crumble. A talking deck case named Decky comes to the human world to search for a Duel Master to preserve equilibrium. There he sees Joe's power to create creatures.
opening_theme: "Mirai wa Joe! Joe! (未来はジョー！ジョー！)" by Hayabusa
ending_theme: "Aa, Yume Mikoshi" (嗚呼、夢神輿) by Matsuri nine. (eps 14-26)
"Ashita e no Kaze" (明日への風) by Rico Sasaki (eps 40-)
